name: express-batteries
author: Jose Montes

scripts.publish: npm run build && bun run upload
scripts.build: npx -p typescript tsc $(find src -name '*.ts') --declaration --allowJs --outDir dist --module ESNext --target ES2022 --moduleResolution bundler --esModuleInterop --allowSyntheticDefaultImports --experimentalDecorators --emitDecoratorMetadata --skipLibCheck

description: Express utilities for building REST APIs include decorators for validation, routing, and IOC, and a Swagger Doc generator.
